about_the_game:
Survival and Crafting:
Dive into a rich survival experience in an open world filled with diverse biomes. Master the art of crafting to create tools, shelter, and essential items from the resources around you. Each biome offers unique materials and challenges, making your crafting journey an ever-evolving adventure.

Building and Customization:
Construct your own haven in this expansive world. From simple shelters to elaborate fortresses, your building skills will be put to the test. Customize your space to reflect your style and meet the challenges of the diverse environments you encounter.

Animal Breeding and Ecosystem:
Interact with a vibrant ecosystem where animal breeding plays a crucial role. Breed different species to aid in your survival, each with unique traits and benefits. The dynamic ecosystem responds to your actions, creating a living, breathing world.

Fishing and Farming:
Engage in relaxing yet rewarding activities like fishing and farming. Cultivate crops and rear animals on your farm for sustenance and resources. Fishing brings a peaceful respite, offering both food and unique items.

Combat and Challenges:
Prepare for thrilling encounters with formidable bosses and monsters. Each biome brings its own set of fearsome creatures, requiring strategic combat skills. Equip yourself with a variety of weapons including magic, bows, and swords to emerge victorious.

Stats, Levels, and Skill Tree:
Grow stronger and more skilled through a detailed system of stats and levels. Tailor your character’s development with a comprehensive skill tree, allowing you to specialize in areas like combat, crafting, or magic, shaping your gameplay experience.

Open World Exploration:
Immerse yourself in an expansive, open world where exploration is limitless. Each biome is a unique playground, filled with secrets to discover and challenges to overcome. Your adventure will be as unique as the paths you choose to explore.

Experience all these elements and more in our low poly survival game, where your choices shape your journey, and every action impacts the world around you. Join us in this captivating adventure of survival and discovery.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is set in a fictional medieval world where the player assumes the role of an adventurer. The player engages in fights and battles and may kill or dispatch enemies and possibly horses using swords, axes, bows and other melee and ranged weapons. The game shows blood effects and rag-doll integrated death animations. Player can purchase wine and ale, and consume these. Game text includes moderate crude language such as bastard, piss, etc.
